speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
My
               
              Lord
               
              of
               
              Salisbury
              ,
               
              we
               
              have
               
              stayed
               
              ten
               
              days

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
And
               
              hardly
               
              kept
               
              our
               
              countrymen
               
              together
              ,

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
And
               
              yet
               
              we
               
              hear
               
              no
               
              tidings
               
              from
               
              the
               
              King
              .

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
Therefore
               
              we
               
              will
               
              disperse
               
              ourselves
              .
               
              Farewell
              .

speaker: SALISBURY
text:
Stay
               
              yet
               
              another
               
              day
              ,
               
              thou
               
              trusty
               
              Welshman
              .

speaker: SALISBURY
text:
The
               
              King
               
              reposeth
               
              all
               
              his
               
              confidence
               
              in
               
              thee
              .

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
’Tis
               
              thought
               
              the
               
              King
               
              is
               
              dead
              .
               
              We
               
              will
               
              not
               
              stay
              .

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
The
               
              bay
               
              trees
               
              in
               
              our
               
              country
               
              are
               
              all
               
              withered
              ,

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
And
               
              meteors
               
              fright
               
              the
               
              fixèd
               
              stars
               
              of
               
              heaven
              ;

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
The
               
              pale-faced
               
              moon
               
              looks
               
              bloody
               
              on
               
              the
               
              Earth
              ,

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
And
               
              lean-looked
               
              prophets
               
              whisper
               
              fearful
               
              change
              ;

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
Rich
               
              men
               
              look
               
              sad
              ,
               
              and
               
              ruffians
               
              dance
               
              and
               
              leap
              ,

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
The
               
              one
               
              in
               
              fear
               
              to
               
              lose
               
              what
               
              they
               
              enjoy
              ,

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
The
               
              other
               
              to
               
              enjoy
               
              by
               
              rage
               
              and
               
              war
              .

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
These
               
              signs
               
              forerun
               
              the
               
              death
               
              or
               
              fall
               
              of
               
              kings
              .

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
Farewell
              .
               
              Our
               
              countrymen
               
              are
               
              gone
               
              and
               
              fled
              ,

speaker:
WELSH
               
              CAPTAIN
text:
As
               
              well
               
              assured
               
              Richard
               
              their
               
              king
               
              is
               
              dead
              .

speaker: SALISBURY
text:
Ah
              ,
               
              Richard
              !
               
              With
               
              the
               
              eyes
               
              of
               
              heavy
               
              mind

speaker: SALISBURY
text:
I
               
              see
               
              thy
               
              glory
               
              like
               
              a
               
              shooting
               
              star

speaker: SALISBURY
text:
Fall
               
              to
               
              the
               
              base
               
              earth
               
              from
               
              the
               
              firmament
              .

speaker: SALISBURY
text:
Thy
               
              sun
               
              sets
               
              weeping
               
              in
               
              the
               
              lowly
               
              west
              ,

speaker: SALISBURY
text:
Witnessing
               
              storms
               
              to
               
              come
              ,
               
              woe
              ,
               
              and
               
              unrest
              .

speaker: SALISBURY
text:
Thy
               
              friends
               
              are
               
              fled
               
              to
               
              wait
               
              upon
               
              thy
               
              foes
              ,

speaker: SALISBURY
text:
And
               
              crossly
               
              to
               
              thy
               
              good
               
              all
               
              fortune
               
              goes
              .
